mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE date_list AS ( -- 1일 생성 SELECT DATE(CONCAT(#{date}, '-01')) AS dt UNION ALL -- 다음 날을 재귀적으로 추가 SELECT DATE_ADD(dt, INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM date_list WHERE MONTH(DATE_ADD(dt, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) = MONTH(CONCAT(#{date}, '-01')) ) SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, COALESCE(SUM(o.ORD_PRICE), 0) AS total_sales FROM date_list d LEFT JOIN ORDER_TBL o ON DATE(o.ORD_REGDATE) = d.dt GROUP BY d.dt ORDER BY d.dt ASC

WITH RECURSIVE hours AS ( SELECT 0 AS hour UNION ALL SELECT hour + 1 FROM hours WHERE hour < 23 ) SELECT h.hour, COALESCE(SUM(o.ORD_PRICE), 0) AS total_sales FROM hours h LEFT JOIN ORDER_TBL o ON HOUR(o.ORD_REGDATE) = h.hour AND o.ORD_REGDATE >= #{start_date} AND o.ORD_REGDATE < #{end_date} GROUP BY h.hour ORDER BY h.hour ASC

SELECT w.weekday, COALESCE(SUM(o.ORD_PRICE), 0) AS total_sales FROM ( SELECT 'Monday' AS weekday UNION ALL SELECT 'Tuesday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Wednesday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Thursday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Friday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Saturday' UNION ALL SELECT 'Sunday' ) AS w LEFT JOIN ORDER_TBL o ON DAYNAME(o.ORD_REGDATE) = w.weekday AND o.ORD_REGDATE >= #{start_date} AND o.ORD_REGDATE < #{end_date} GROUP BY w.weekday ORDER BY FIELD(w.weekday, 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday')

SELECT m.month, COALESCE(SUM(o.ORD_PRICE), 0) AS total_sales FROM ( SELECT 1 AS month UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11 UNION ALL SELECT 12 ) AS m LEFT JOIN ORDER_TBL o ON MONTH(o.ORD_REGDATE) = m.month AND YEAR(o.ORD_REGDATE) = #{year} GROUP BY m.month ORDER BY m.month ASC
